name: biomni-run-3d-chondrogenic-aggregate-assay
title: Biomni: Run 3D Chondrogenic Aggregate Assay
description: Runs 3D chondrogenic aggregate assay for cartilage research
content:
Overview

Runs 3D chondrogenic aggregate assay for cartilage research and drug testing. Evaluates compounds for their ability to promote or inhibit chondrogenesis in three-dimensional cell culture models relevant to osteoarthritis and cartilage regeneration.

Input Parameters

  • chondrocyte_cells (required): Chondrocyte cell line or primary cell information
  • test_compounds (required): List of compounds to test with concentrations
  • culture_duration_days (optional): Duration of aggregate culture (default: 21 days)
  • measurement_intervals (optional): Interval between measurements in days (default: 7)

Input Format

{
  "chondrocyte_cells": "Primary human articular chondrocytes",
  "test_compounds": [
    {"name": "TGF-beta3", "concentration": "10 ng/mL"},
    {"name": "BMP-2", "concentration": "100 ng/mL"}
  ],
  "culture_duration_days": 21,
  "measurement_intervals": 7
}

Biological Use Case

Essential for developing disease-modifying osteoarthritis drugs (DMOADs) and cartilage regeneration therapies. Evaluates compounds for chondroprotective effects, ECM production (collagen II, aggrecan), and GAG synthesis. Used in preclinical screening for musculoskeletal drug discovery and regenerative medicine applications.

Output

Chondrogenic assay results including aggregate size, GAG content, collagen production, gene expression profiles, and compound efficacy rankings saved to chondrogenic_assay_results.txt

Category

pharmacology
